decks.notes: This deck focuses on using disruptive and control elements to maintain tempo and disrupt the opponent's strategy while quickly applying pressure with aggressive creatures. The deck includes a mix of efficient removal and counterspells to control the board, while also utilizing card draw and filtering to maintain a consistent game plan. The aggro aspect of the deck is supported by creatures like Murktide Regent and Nethergoyf, which can quickly close out the game if left unchecked. This Dimir Aggro deck seeks to disrupt the opponent's plans while presenting a fast clock to secure victory.

The deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's game plan through countermagic and control elements while utilizing the Stiflenought combo of Phyrexian Dreadnought and Stifle to quickly bring out a powerful threat. It aims to maintain tempo and board presence with efficient card draw and removal spells, while keeping the opponent off balance with disruptive spells like Dress Down and Daze. The deck's mana base is optimized to support the deck's strategy, with a focus on fetching and utilizing important lands like Wasteland and Mystic Sanctuary.

The main idea of this deck is to assemble and protect the Coveted Jewel combo, which involves generating a large amount of colorless mana to power out powerful spells and creatures such as Emrakul, the Aeons Torn. This combo deck focuses on using Urza's Saga to tutor for key pieces like Grim Monolith and Phyrexian Metamorph to create infinite mana loops. With a variety of cantrips and countermagic like Force of Will, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's strategy and win the game through overwhelming resources and powerful threats.

The main concept of this Dimir Aggro deck is to control the opponent's resources and disrupt their game plan while applying pressure with efficient creatures like Nethergoyf. The deck includes a mix of disruptive spells like Hymn to Tourach and Fatal Push, along with counterspells like Force of Will and Daze to protect its key threats. Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student provides card advantage, while Mishra's Bauble and Brainstorm help with deck manipulation. The deck aims to outvalue the opponent through disruption and efficient creature threats, ultimately overwhelming them to secure a victory.

This deck focuses on quickly assembling the necessary pieces to cast Necrodominance, allowing the player to cheat out large creatures or other powerful spells from their graveyard. By utilizing cards like Gemstone Mine and Chancellor of the Annex to generate mana quickly, along with acceleration from cards like Simian Spirit Guide and Lotus Petal, the player aims to overwhelm their opponent with powerful plays early in the game. Other cards like Borne Upon a Wind and Pact of Negation help to protect their strategy and ensure its success.

The main focus of this Control - Stiflenought deck is to disrupt and control the opponent's game plan through counterspells like Force of Will and Stifle, while also utilizing removal spells like Swords to Plowshares. The deck aims to clear the way for the powerful Phyrexian Dreadnought, a high-value threat that can quickly close out games. The deck also includes card draw and manipulation spells like Brainstorm and Ponder to help find key cards, as well as mana denial with Wasteland.
